Smokescreen/Grimmler/Firearm/Rex:




Grimmler opened fire at Bright Blade's back, getting to one knee and 
firing with his laser weapon.

Firearm charged, firing off a few blasts at Bright Blade's legs with 
his plasma cannon.

Rex ran for Bright Blade, weapon trained on her head.

------

Smokescreen looked around the control station, seeing a few buttons 
after memorizing where the chute Bright Blade was crawling towards 
was.  He pressed a few buttons, a small bar extending from behind the 
metallic "door" of the chute, blocking it halfway, making it nearly 
impossible to get through.

Smokescreen stopped manually firing his autogun, the autoguns soon 
firing upon Bright Blade once more.  He began looking for where in 
the Pit that chute lead to.  He would just seal the room it lead to.
